#summary DMX protocol specification (Quick)

= Introduction =

This document includes all the required skills to sending data to DMX bus devices.


= Definitions =

== Node ==

A *node* is a part of a DMX bus like dimmer or movinglights.

  * part of a bus
  * listening bus traffic
  * has one or more channels


= Physical aspects =

== Topologie ==

  * The connectivity between several nodes is based on a physical *bus topolegie*.
  * The first node on the bus - called *source* - supports data are sending thru the bus. The following nodes - called *receiver* - receives the data and make some action.
